title: Delicata Squash With Cauliflower Purée, Brown Butter and Hazelnuts
sub_head: Served on a bed of creamy cauliflower purée, this simple, nourishing and deeply soothing roasted squash benefits from a sprinkling of toasted hazelnuts and a drizzle of rich brown butter
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
